snippet: Yulia V. Tymoshenko can receive medical care outside the prison camp where she has been since December, a step that may be intended to quiet Western criticism of her treatment.
abstract: Ukraine's general prosecutor says jailed opposition leader Yulia V Tymoshenko can receive medical treatment outside the prison where she has been incarcerated.
lead_paragraph: Yulia V. Tymoshenko can receive medical care outside the prison camp where she has been since December, a step that may be intended to quiet Western criticism of her treatment.

headline.seo: Yulia V. Tymoshenko, Jailed Ukrainian Opposition Leader, Is Cleared for Treatment
headline.main: Jailed Ukrainian Opposition Leader Is Cleared for Medical Care
headline.print_headline: Ukraine: Opposition Leader Allowed To Seek Medical Care Outside Prison
